name: Crash and Code: The Story
description:
Crash & Code was a program offered at the Macedon Public Library during Summer Reading, Summer 2019. A basic story was set for a rocket ship to launch and have difficulties in space (see other interactive fiction, titled "Crash & Code: The Prequel" for more information).  

Here we have several story choices created by the children who participated in this program, Have fun reading through and making your choices for what might happen if you have to crash your space ship. Built using Twine.
